title: About Me
intro: Software developer | electronics and smart home enthusiast | tinkerer
summary: I am an enthusiastic and passionate developer with experience in using a broad range of modern technology stacks. Experienced working in multiple sectors including consultancy, retail, charity, telecommunications, and insurance, and have used the Agile methodology throughout. I have worked with businesses to create eCommerce websites and full stack applications under my company Element Software Ltd since 2018.
